articles.description: In the build-up to the US Open, eventual men's champion Jannik Sinner was cleared of fault or negligence over two failed doping tests. Yet questions remain over the case.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Does doping case leave cloud hanging over US Open victory?

articles.description: Moses Swaibu was one of the brightest prospects in Crystal Palace's youth ranks, but he ended up in a shady world of cash, danger and fixing rather than football's limelight.
articles.title: Moses Swaibu: Match-fixer from Crystal Palace youth team star

articles.description: Captain Harry Kane will become just the 10th man to make 100 England appearances when the Three Lions face Finland in the Nations League at Wembley on Tuesday.
articles.title: Harry Kane: England striker set to make 100th international appearance

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Montenegro v Wales in the Uefa Nations League.
articles.title: Montenegro v Wales: Uefa Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: England's defeat against Sri Lanka was careless rather than a crisis, but it proves they need to find a ruthlessness, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka: 'Don't make Coldplay comparison, aim for winning mentality'

articles.description:
England captain Harry Kane says Cristiano Ronaldo, who scored his 901st career goal at the age of 39 against Scotland on Sunday, "inspires me to play for as long as possible".
Kane is set to earn his 100th international cap on Tuesday against Finland.
articles.title: Harry Kane: Cristiano Ronaldo inspires me to play for as long as possible

articles.description: Craig Bellamy is proud of his first Wales win with a match in Montenegro played in what he describes as the “toughest conditions" he has ever faced.
articles.title: Craig Bellamy proud of Wales' Montenegro win in 'toughest conditions'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Norway vs Austria in the UEFA Nations League
articles.title: Norway vs Austria: UEFA Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Tammy Beaumont's unbeaten 150 helps England thrash Ireland in the second ODI and take an unassailable 2-0 series lead.
articles.title: Ireland vs England: Tammy Beaumont scores 150 not out as visitors seal series win

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from France vs Belgium in the UEFA Nations League
articles.title: France vs Belgium: UEFA Nations League - BBC Sport
